content:
Yes, you are right! Addressing the basic needs of residents such as healthcare, housing, and access to basic facilities is crucial for improving the overall quality of life in any community. Once these basic needs are addressed, it becomes easier to focus on more advanced infrastructure projects that can lead to economic growth and help the community thrive.

Investing in these basic needs also has positive ripple effects in the long run since it builds a foundation for a more prosperous and sustainable future. Apart from that, it could also help to create more job opportunities and reduce poverty in the county while improving the wellbeing and overall quality of life of the residents of Longford.
